channel.title: Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.6.12)
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.6.12)

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Changelog # All notable changes to this project are documented in this page. The format is based on Keep a Changelog. 1.6.12 - 2024-04-09 # Removed # Activeness Optimization for Constraint component #996 The constraint component is too complex to optimize correctly and reliably 1.6.11 - 2024-04-07 # Fixed # Bounds become broken if Update When Offscreen is enabled #990 1.6.10 - 2024-04-05 # Fixed # Missing Reference Exception with Trace and Optimize #986 1.
